dialogue.title: ai:Good_Morning
dialogue.text: Good Morning Derek! It is time to wake up.

dialogue.title: ai:Feeling
dialogue.text: How are you? Aren't you feeling great today?!

dialogue.title: ai:Reassure
dialogue.text: Ambition is the path to success. Persistence is the vehicle you arrive in - Bill Bradley. Oh, what inspiration to start the day!

dialogue.title: ai:Motivate
dialogue.text: Every great dream begins with a dreamer. Always remember, you have within you the strength, the patience, and the passion to reach for the stars to change the world - Harriet Tubman.

dialogue.title: ai:News
dialogue.text: How about hearing today's news?

dialogue.title: ai:Song?
dialogue.text: Alright. That's fine. Wpuld you prefer your favorite music instead?

dialogue.title: ai:Showered_Enough?
dialogue.text: Don't you think you have showered long enough?

dialogue.title: ai:Great
dialogue.text: Very good Derek! Did you know, a 5 minute shower uses 100 litres of water, but with a reduced-flow showerhead less than half is used. Good thing we have the reduced-flow!

dialogue.title: ai:Alright
dialogue.text: That's alright. But did you know 2.5 billion people around the world don't have access to improved sanitation? I'm glad we can enjoy a shower with clean, fresh water.

dialogue.title: ai:Seriously!
dialogue.text: Okay seriously! You have showered enough!

dialogue.title: ai:WHO
dialogue.text: According to the Joint Monitoring Programme report of WHO and UNICEF 844 million people don’t have clean water! And you feel the best use of it is to drain it.

dialogue.title: ai:Benjamin
dialogue.text: When the well's dry, we know the worth of water – Benjamin Franklin.

dialogue.title: ai:Dashing
dialogue.text: Yes! You look very charming! Perhaps you want to hurry up though? You are running late for work.

dialogue.title: ai:Drive?
dialogue.text: You sure you want to drive to work?

dialogue.title: ai:Blame
dialogue.text: Your call! But don't go around blaming me for your tardiness like last time.

dialogue.title: ai:Carbon?
dialogue.text: You'll be adding greenhouse gases to the atmosphere that we all have been striving to reduce. You sure you want that Derek?

dialogue.title: ai:Bus_Umbrella
dialogue.text: Great! If you run out the door you'll... no! Forget the coffee. It's bad for you anyway. Remember the diarrhea it caused? Let's get going before we miss the bus. Oh, don't forget your umbrella.... you're welcome!

dialogue.title: ai:Car
dialogue.text: The car is only meant for emergencies and... oh... so you're not going to heed my advice? I see. This will go down in your report. Nope. Too late. Drive along now!

dialogue.title: ai:Finally
dialogue.text: Finally! Talked some sense into you! Now let's grab that bus before we miss it!

dialogue.title: ai:Not_Understand
dialogue.text: I'm sorry! I didn't quite get that. Could you repeat that again?

dialogue.title: ai:Unacceptable
dialogue.text: That is not an acceptable response. It is best being definitive in your decisions.
